dcterms:creator: E. Sandhaus
dcterms:description: The New York Times Annotated Corpus is a collection of articles from The New York Times, annotated for various linguistic features, which is used for training and evaluating natural language processing models.
dcterms:title: New York Times

dcterms:creator: K. M. Hermann
T. Kocisky
E. Grefenstette
L. Espeholt
W. Kay
M. Suleyman
P. Blunsom
dcterms:description: The CNN/Daily Mail dataset consists of news articles and their corresponding summaries, designed for training and evaluating summarization models.
dcterms:title: CNN/Daily Mail
